direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the size of collections associated with keys, but 'totalSize' aggregates sizes across all keys.
Both methods iterate over collections within the map, though 'containsValue' checks for the presence of a specific value.
The 'put' method modifies the collections that 'totalSize' counts, making it a relevant method for testing side effects.
The 'removeMapping' method also modifies the collections that 'totalSize' counts, making it relevant for testing side effects.
Both methods involve iterating over the map's contents, though 'iterator' provides a different view of the data.
The 'values' method returns a collection of all values, similar to how 'totalSize' aggregates values, though it returns a collection instead of a size.
